description: We finally got Ariel X back for round two of Waterbondage and she was twice the fun! Theme of the day: struggling! Once again Ariel does not disappoint. There is a resistance scene; a "no knots" escape scene; a "no escape" fucking machine scene; and for the tank scene, Ariel tries out our latest bondage device: lighting grip clamps! Check this hot update out and see why Ariel X is a Kink.com favorite.
title: Ariel X
